Title: Game Routes
Description: A game has n levels, connected by m teleporters, and your task is to get from level 1 to level n. The game has been designed so that there are no directed cycles in the underlying graph. In how many ways can you complete the game?
Input Specification:
The first input line has two integers n and m: the number of levels and teleporters. The levels are numbered 1,2,\dots,n. 
 After this, there are m lines describing the teleporters. Each line has two integers a and b: there is a teleporter from level a to level b.
Output Specification: Print one integer: the number of ways you can complete the game. Since the result may be large, print it modulo 10^9+7.
